ingredient_list: ['2 each Mission® Kid Size Flour Tortillas with Edible Disney® Tortilla Decals', '4 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 cup strawberries, hulled (cut off the green parts), sliced', '½ (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, well drained', '1 medium banana, sliced', '¼ cup flaked coconut']
directions_instructions: ['Spread 2 Tbsp. peanut butter on each tortilla.', 'On each tortilla, place 1/2 sliced banana on top of peanut butter. Then, top each with 1/2 cup of strawberries, pineapple and coconut.', 'Fold in half.', 'Place Edible Disney® Decals on Tortillas and enjoy (instructions on back of Mission Kid Size Tortilla package).']
nutrition_summary: ['516 calories; protein 13.1g; carbohydrates 70.5g; fat 22g; sodium 488.1mg. Full Nutrition']
